text: John Joseph Horgan (August 7, 1959 - November 12, 2024) was a Canadian politician. He was the 36th Premier of British Columbia from July 2017 until November 18, 2022. He was the leader of the British Columbia New Democratic Party from May 4, 2014 until October 21, 2022. Following the leadership election, he was appointed the Official Opposition Critic for Energy, and Opposition House Leader."Dix announces BC NDP shadow cabinet". The Tyee, April 26, 2011. He was replaced by Bruce Ralston as Opposition House Leader following his entry into the 2014 leadership election. ==Health and death== On November 4, 2021, Horgan announced that he had a malignant tumor in his throat and needed radiation treatment. On June 28, 2022, Horgan said he would step down as both premier and leader of the BC NDP party when a new leader was been selected. In early 2024, Horgan was diagnosed with thyroid cancer. He died from the disease in Victoria, British Columbia on November 12, 2024, aged 65.Former B.C. premier John Horgan, Canada's ambassador to Germany, dead at 65 ==References== ==Other websites== *John Horgan NDP Caucus page *John Horgan MLA *Legislative Assembly of British Columbia *John Horgan's Web Page for the 2014 BC NDP Leadership Campaign Category:1959 births Category:2024 deaths Category:People from Victoria, British Columbia Category:Premiers of British Columbia Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer
